thread.title: 5 Best Bay Area Places To Visit
thread.title_full: 5 Best Bay Area Places To Visit

author: admin
title: 5 Best Bay Area Places To Visit
text:
Home > Travel Destinations > 5 Best Bay Area Places To Visit 5 Best Bay Area Places To Visit By admin on October 15, 2015 Pin It 
Streets lined up with some of the most beautiful Victorian homes, a sparkling and wonderful bay and cable cars makes the Bay Area is undeniably one of the greatest places to visit in the world. The place is located along Northern California and is home to the world’s finest wine countries like Sonoma and Napa valley. 
The Bay Area also boasts of dramatic beaches and waterfront towns. It is important for you to note that you will not require a notebook in order to get an idea about Bay Area places to visit. This is because this area is filled with some of the most popular and exotic locations and people tend to know about. Top Bay Area Places To Visit 
Some of the best Bay Area places to visit, which are worth visiting are included below: San Francisco Photo Credits: Noel Kerns 
There are a lot of things that you can see and enjoy in San Francisco and therefore it is one of the best Bay Area places to visit. San Francisco is a place filled with life and there is always some kind of stuff happening here. 
The places also has some popular tourist spots like Golden Gate Bridge, San Francisco Cable Car System, Fisherman’ s Wharf, China Town and various other popular museums. Half Moon Bay Photo Credits: Nazhiyath Vijayan 
Half Moon Bay is one of the most beautiful places in the Bay Area, which you should visit. This coastal small town, which is located in San Mateo County of California, attracts many tourists every year. 
Some of the tourist attractions in this place are Methodist Episcopal Church, William Adam Simmons House, Robert Mills Dairy Barn, James Johnston House, Half Moon Bay Beach, etc Marin County Photo Credits: Marc Evans 
Marin County is just on the other side of Golden Gate Bridge in San Francisco and it is a charming little place with pretty atmosphere and beautiful landscape. The place also possesses some of the best places to play and eat. Some of the beautiful Bay Area places to visit in Marin County include, Marin Highlands, Stinson Beach, Marin County Civic Center, Point Reyes National Seashore, Ring Mountain, Richardson Bay, Tiburon peninsula, and Mount Tamalpais. Oakland 
Oakland of Alameda County in San Francisco Bay area is one the largest port city in the west coast of USA. Oakland is not only of the best Bay Area places to visit also one of the popular tourist attractions to visit in USA. 
Some of the attractions in Oakland include Oakland Museum of California, Paramount Theater, Lake Merritt, Lake Temescal, Jack London Square, Children’s Fairyland, Oakland Zoo, Mountain View Cemetery, USS Potomac, etc. Alcatraz Island 
Alcatraz Island is a small island located at a distance of 1.5 miles from the shore of San Francisco, which basically developed for facilitating lighthouse, military prison, military fortification, and federal prison. 
You can reach this island by taking a ferry from Pier 33 in Fisherman’s Wharf. The main attraction at Alcatraz Island include lighthouse, rock pools, seabird colony, main cellhouse, dining hall, liberty, ruins of Warden’s house, parade ground, etc.
